}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00000741-50Z", (what appears to be) "EW-7611HAN V1.0A", and "Project Code-09014-113" is silkscreened on the board.
Hawking's drivers identify the device as a ''Hawking HWDN3 Wls-N Dish Adapter''.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
